tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(15), address TEXT)
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone VARCHAR(15), address VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, order_date TIMESTAMP, order_total DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id))
Customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(20), address VARCHAR(255))
Orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2))
Products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255), unit_price DECIMAL(8, 2), in_stock BOOLEAN)
Sales (sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2))

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount NUMERIC(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);
